channel.title: Comments on: Tuesday Newsday: Newspaper Developer Blogs

item.title: By: Tuesday Newsday: Data News Sites – - Martha Rotter's BlogMartha Rotter's Blog
item.dc:creator: Tuesday Newsday: Data News Sites – - Martha Rotter's BlogMartha Rotter's Blog
item.description: [...] men­tioned The Guardian’s Data Blog in a recent post about news developer blogs as a great example of com­munity build­ing. But clearly it is also one of the best sources in the [...]
item.content:encoded: […] men­tioned The Guardian’s Data Blog in a recent post about news developer blogs as a great example of com­munity build­ing. But clearly it is also one of the best sources in the […]

item.title: By: martha
item.dc:creator: martha
item.description:
Hi John,
Thanks for your comment - definitely a good point! I think there's a strong argument for creating incentives around something like this or even building it into the team culture if possible, so that it becomes an additional part of your workflow like writing tests & writing documentation.
It's definitely not easy to make sure it happens, but as the examples show it's really worth the effort.
--Martha
item.content:encoded:
Hi John,

Thanks for your comment – definitely a good point! I think there’s a strong argument for creating incentives around something like this or even building it into the team culture if possible, so that it becomes an additional part of your workflow like writing tests & writing documentation.

It’s definitely not easy to make sure it happens, but as the examples show it’s really worth the effort.

–Martha

item.title: By: John Muldoon
item.dc:creator: John Muldoon
item.description: Martha, I think you forgot one excuse: The well-meaning individual who agrees with all of what you said but never actually gets around to updating their blog. John
item.content:encoded:
Martha,
I think you forgot one excuse: The well-meaning individual who agrees with all of what you said but never actually gets around to updating their blog.
John
